plot: Leslie is forced to make a sacrifice to assure passage of a bill, Ron meets a single woman while fixing a pothole, and Ben and April are stuck in a parking lot and can't make it back to Pawnee.

In this episode Leslie tries to convince Jamm to vote on the Fun in the Sun Act in order to keep the public pools open longer. When Jamm says he will only vote on it if Leslie gives up her new office, Leslie tries to convince Milton to vote on it instead.
